1.0.name: wordpress/spy-analytics-lite
1.0.description:
The problem of simple visitor statistic is you can’t see WHY. Why visitors so quickly left a page? Why they don’t buy this product or why they don’t subscribe your newsletter. You can get answers if you see what they exactly do on the pages. Spy analytics is a simple tool, that can record visitors’ actions like scroll, mouse (eye) move and clicks.

See it in action

Features:

  1. Record and view mouse move actions;
  2. Record and view window resize actions;
  3. Record and view page scroll actions;
  4. Record and view mouse clicks (Full version only);
  5. Detect user IP, Country, OS, Browser, Mobile, Wp user name (Full version only);
